course.title: MAT 3378 Analysis of Experimental Designs (3 units)
course.desc: Distribution theory for experimental designs. Experimental designs: Completely randomized, complete and incomplete block designs, Latin squares, split-plot, fractional, factorial and response surface designs. Sample size and power determination. Simultaneous inference. Variance component models. Analysis of data using statistical software packages.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: MAT 1341, MAT 2371, (MAT 2375 or MAT 2378 or MAT 2379).
